module.name: connection_of_individual_activity
module.keywords: module, connection, individual, activity, process plant

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record a connection relationship between individual activities.
A connection between activities indicates that matter, energy, mechanical load or information can be transferred between them.

ul.li: the individual activity 'maintain de-icing plant IC_27 on 2002-10-26'; and
the individual activity 'operate de-icing plant IC_27 during the winter of 2002/2003',

example.p: that indicates the maintenance activity puts de-icing plant IC_27 in a fit state for its subsequent use, is a Connection_of_individual_activity.
In this example, the state of de-icing plant IC_27 'flows' from one activity to the next.

li.p: a relationship between one individual activity and another that indicates the two are connected.

li.note: Class of connection of activity is within the scope of the Class_of_connection_of_activity application module.

li.p: classification of a connection relationship between activities.
li.note: Classification of connection of activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.

uof.name: Connection_of_individual_activity
uof.description: The Connection_of_individual_activity UoF identifies a connection between individual activities and defines the individual activities that are connected.
